content.rendered:
Vision – Mission – Core values

Vision

Lumi determined to be the first brand in the domestic Smart Home market, introducing Vietnamese intellectualls to the world and competing with technological powers such as Japan, Republic of South, Korean, Eupore the USA.

Mission

At Lumi, We have set our hearts to bring about living solutions for customers, to effectively operate and cooperate with  partners towards the goal of sustainable development as well as speard out positive messages to the society

Core values

– Quality commitment: ” quality is a prerequisite factor to the company’s development credibility
– Stay creative: constantly learn and keep pace with Science-Technology breakthroughs in the worldto apply those in improvement in existing products…

Business development Process

 

ESTABLISHED
by 3 former members of Robocon team – Hanoi University of Science and Technology
27-04-2012

Officially joined the Smart Home market with Smart Touch Switch
23-09-2014

Completed smart home solutions that can be controlled via smartphone
27-10-2015

Achieved UL certificate
05-2016

Achieved CE certificate
08-2016

Exported to 5 countries: India, Brazil, Israel, Australia, Thailand
06-2017

Released the home controlling by Vietnamese voice
06-2017

Achieved Google Assistant certificate
05-2019

Successfully integrated with Apple ecosystem
11-2019

Exported to 9 countries: Thailand, Singapore, India, Israel, …
Năm 2020

Achieved Tech Awards 2020 for The best smarthome brand
2020

Received “Certificate of Science and Technology Enterprise”
08-2020

Signing a strategic cooperation agreement to develop Smart Lighting technology

10-2020

For the second consecutive year, received Tech Awards 2021 for The best smarthome brand
2021

Achieved “Sao Khue Award 2021” for AI Controller Artificial Intelligence Application Security solution
04-2021

Launched LUVIT Smart Lock, Lumi – Dea Smart Gate, AI Camera Hub.
10-2021

Signed a cooperation agreement to jointly develop the Camera AI technology platform with Pavana
11-2021

Received double Sao Khue Awards 2022 with Smart Lighting solution and Luvit Smartlock
04-2022

10th anniversary – The largest first IoT/Smarthome conference in Vietnam: Lumi officially repositioned and published Vietnam Smarthome report 2022
27-04-2022

Launched Lumi Lighting – the high-end smart lighting collection
05-2022

Achieved Industrie 4.0 Award
07-2022

Launched Multi-room Audio V3.0
07-2022

Launched Lumi Lighting 2023 collection
02-2023

Launched AI Camera Lupa solution
04-2023

Launched Lumi Life+ app
05-2023

Launched Smart Gate Module
06-2023

Launched Lumi Presence Sensor
07-2023

Lumi Factory officially operated
08-2023

Launched Premium Home Controller
08-2023

Core abilities

Research

The talented and experienced engineering team ensures products with high quality and constant improvements, widening the smart home ecosystem

Production

PCBA production line is subject to Japanese standard, the assembly line is processed in a clean, hygienic factory

Distribution

150 biggest agents on the domestic market

Export

Lumi smart home products, certified by international standards such as CE and QUACERT, have been successfully exported to 9 countries worldwide, including Thailand, Singapore, India,...

Company Culture

 

Prioritize individual speciality development

Lumiers are always careful in every task, eager to learn from colleagues, partners with a view to completing themselves as well as making greater contribution to the company

Each challenge is a motivation, each failure is an inspiration

At Lumi, there is no fear of making mistake. With the ” Just do it ” spirit, Lumiers are alway ready to cope up with difficulties and try their best to bring about the most comprehensive customer experience

Sharing and cooperative spirit

Lumi focuses on connecting individuals in terms of work and personal life through outdoor activities, creating the most comfortable environment

Business cooperation

 

Lumi smart home signed cooperation with Viettel construction joint stock company

Lumi smart home officially joined the most competitive market in the world

Cooperation with FPT FUNiX Online University, Lumi Smart Home Vietnam affirms its leading position

See more

Components Suppliers
